original_text: If she does not please her master, who has designated her for himself, then he shall let her be redeemed. He shall have no right to sell her to a foreign people, since he has broken faith with her.
korean_text: 만일 상전이 그를 기뻐하지 아니하여 상관하지 아니하면 그를 속량하게 할 것이나 상전이 그 여자를 속인 것이 되었으니 외국인에게는 팔지 못할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If she does not please her master
sentences.korean_translation: 만일 그가 그 주인에게 마음에 들지 않으면

sentences.original_text: who has designated her for himself
then he shall let her be redeemed
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그녀가 속전을 치르고 가게 해야 한다

sentences.original_text: He shall have no right to sell her
since he has broken faith with her
